channel.title: How do u make the npcs say ur name not the coders (or real owner
channel.description:
Please help how do i change owner is ______________??
Help
and donno if this is correct place to do it at

item.title: How do u make the npcs say ur name not the coders (or real owner
item.dc:creator: @pur3_robin pur3 robin
item.description:
@pur3_robin wrote:

kk Thanx Every one it worked :o 

       ;DBooo yah!!!!!!!!!!!!1 ;D




      ><> peace <><

and thanx for the examples =)

item.title: How do u make the npcs say ur name not the coders (or real owner
item.dc:creator: @newservermaker newservermaker
item.description:
@newservermaker wrote:

[quote=“D D 3, post:7, topic:150236”]This is the real way XD

Go into npchandeler

Search for what it says right now or what the npc id is.
So if the npc said Owner is D D 3,you would search for that and change it to The owner is (yournamehere)

Save+compile

Explained easier mmh kay owned lol. XD[/quote]

not very explained…

heres a simple way

go into npchandler and search

moo

and add this under it

else if (npcs[i].npcType == NPC THAT TALKS HERE) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) //this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("UR NAME HERE")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "TEXT HERE"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "TEXT HERE"; } } }

then you can add more so it says other peoples names by adding it agein with a different npc id.

then all you need to do is save and compile and BOOM! it works

Read full topic
item.source: How do u make the npcs say ur name not the coders (or real owner

item.title: How do u make the npcs say ur name not the coders (or real owner
item.dc:creator: @D_D_3 D D 3
item.description:
@D_D_3 wrote:

This is the real way XD

Go into npchandeler

Search for what it says right now or what the npc id is.
So if the npc said Owner is D D 3,you would search for that and change it to The owner is (yournamehere)

Save+compile

Explained easier mmh kay owned lol. XD

Read full topic
